directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Coinbase (COIN) Stock Week Ahead: Stock-Trading Rollout, Prediction-Market Lawsuits, Analyst Targets and Key Catalysts for Dec.
Bitcoin price faces record $23B options expiry Dec 26. Implied volatility at 44% signals contained year-end action before 2026 turbulence...
Global markets were hit with a violent liquidity whiplash today as conflicting central bank signals collided with a massive derivatives...
Market reports linked the selloff to renewed fears that the BoJ will tighten monetary policy at its meeting this week, threatening the yen...
Bitcoin prices pushed lower on Thursday, November 20, extending recent losses as macro variables fueled weakness in the markets.

hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Void Amplification During Stress Events
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regime transitions (VIX >30, BTC 1-day volatility >80%), negative catalysts will create 2-3x amplified moves due to liquidity evaporation, with the majority of the move occurring in 3 concentrated 15-minute periods.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Stress regimes feature thin liquidity and high dealer gamma. Negative catalysts trigger stop-loss cascades and margin calls that are amplified by algorithmic liquidations. The $23B options expiry could trigger such a regime if volatility spikes in 2026 as predicted.
entry_conditions: Regime transitioning to STRESS (VIX >30, BTC 1-day vol >80%)
Negative catalyst hits (exchange outage, major hack, regulatory shock)
Order book depth on top 3 exchanges drops >40% from 7-day average

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price finds stable support/resistance with order book depth recovery to >70% of average
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Not applicable (hypothesis about amplification, not directional trade)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If stress-regime catalysts consistently produce moves ≤1.5x normal regime moves, or if liquidity doesn't drop below 60% of average during events.
